CustomField.formula: 'The late fee for this client is ' + TEXT(Billing_Currency__c) + ' ' + Text( Late_fee_per_asset__c) + ' per asset, with a ' + TEXT(Billing_Currency__c) + ' ' + TEXT( Late_Fee_Minimum__c ) + ' minimum per order and ' + TEXT(Billing_Currency__c) + ' ' + TEXT( Late_Fee_Maximum__c) + ' maximum per order.'
CustomField.label: Late Fee Message
